comments.body: We use 2-space indentation for all the files in this directory. Might be worth staying consistent.
I copied this from scoop upstream, I‚Äôd rather not make unnecessary modifications.

comments.body: I don‚Äôt expect to actually use this but it shouldn‚Äôt cause problems and I like staying as close to upstream as possible :slightly_smiling_face:
